trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST010_00001_SEQ_00<tab>Bernadette is searching for adventurers eager to prove their mettle.

TEXT_SUBFST010_00001_SEQ_01<tab>Bernadette informs you that the Gods' Quiver is seeking ambitious adventurers to assist them, and encourages you to present yourself before Chansteloup outside the Archers' Guild.
TEXT_SUBFST010_00001_SEQ_02<tab>Though skeptical, Chansteloup is willing to offer you an opportunity to prove your worth.
TEXT_SUBFST010_00001_BERNADETTE_000_1<tab>Newly come to Gridania, are you? In search of fame and fortune, perhaps?

TEXT_SUBFST010_00001_BERNADETTE_000_2<tab>If you have confidence in your abilities, I urge you to speak with Chansteloup of the Gods' Quiver. You can find him standing vigil before the Archers' Guild.

TEXT_SUBFST010_00001_BERNADETTE_000_3<tab>The creatures of the Twelveswood have been behaving most unnaturally of late, and it has fallen to the Gods' Quiver to pacify them. Alas, they are sorely undermanned.
TEXT_SUBFST010_00001_BERNADETTE_000_4<tab>For this reason, they seek able adventurers to supplement their ranks. I am certain that your offer of aid would be well received.
TEXT_SUBFST010_00001_CHANSTELOUP_000_11<tab>Well, inexperienced or not, if you wish to prove your worth to the people of Gridania, you were right to come.
TEXT_SUBFST010_00001_CHANSTELOUP_000_12<tab>You <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> wish to prove yourself, do you not?
